bibl.title: The Text of P127 (P.Oxy. 4968) and its Relationship with the Text of Codex Bezae. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXIV, 4968 (= LDAB 119313). - 1. Introduction. - 2. Agreement between variants in P127 and D05 in extensively rewritten verses. - 3. The text of P127: singular variants and variants shared with more, or other mss. than D05. - 4. Results.
bibl.seg: Gäbel Georg, The Text of P127 (P.Oxy. 4968) and its Relationship with the Text of Codex Bezae. Avec résumé en anglais.

P. Oxy. LXXIV, 4968 (= LDAB 119313). - 1. Introduction. - 2. Agreement between variants in P127 and D05 in extensively rewritten verses. - 3. The text of P127: singular variants and variants shared with more, or other mss. than D05. - 4. Results.
